atk-abh03a44:2_1: Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme saccavasena saṅgaṇhitvā dhātuyamakānantaraṁ desitassa saccayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a44:2_2: Tatthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā antaravārādayo ca avasesappabhedā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:2_3: Paṇṇattivāre panettha catunnaṁ saccānaṁ vasena padasodhanavāro,
atk-abh03a44:2_6: suddhasaccamūlacakkavāroti imesu catūsu vāresu yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:3_1: Paṇṇattivāraniddese pana avasesaṁ dukkhasaccanti dukkhavedanāya ceva taṇhāya ca vinimuttā tebhūmakadhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:3_2: Avaseso samudayoti saccavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalādibhedo dukkhasaccassa paccayo.
atk-abh03a44:3_4: Avaseso maggoti “tasmiṁ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-abh03a44:6_1: Pavattivāre panettha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye “yassa dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:6_6: nirodhasaccamūlakena ekenāti labbhamānañca alabbhamānañca gahetvā pāḷivasena chahi yamakehi bhavitabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:6_10: samudayasaccamūlakaṁ maggasaccena saddhiṁ ekanti tīṇi yamakāni āgatāni.
atk-abh03a44:6_12: Evamettha sabbavāresu tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ yamakānaṁ vasena yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a44:6_14: imassa hi saccayamakassa pavattivāre nirodhasaccaṁ tāva na labbhateva.
atk-abh03a44:6_15: Sesesu pana tīsu samudayasaccamaggasaccāni ekantena pavattiyaṁyeva labbhanti.
atk-abh03a44:6_17: Paccuppannādayo pana tayo kālā cutipaṭisandhīnampi pavattiyāpi vasena labbhanti.
atk-abh03a44:7_3: Taṇhāvippayuttacittassāti idaṁ dukkhasaccasamudayasaccesu ekakoṭṭhāsassa uppattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_5: Catuvokāre pana taṇhāvippayuttassa phalasamāpatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe ekampi saccaṁ nuppajjati.
atk-abh03a44:7_7: Tesaṁ dukkhasaccañcāti tasmiñhi khaṇe taṇhaṁ ṭhapetvā sesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ nāma hotīti sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_11: Teneva kāraṇena “arūpe maggassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ maggasaccaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a44:7_12: no ca tesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a44:7_13: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tatthāti tesaṁ tasmiṁ upapattikkhaṇe
atk-abh03a44:7_14: taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a44:10_4: Yasmā ca lokuttaradhammesu pariññā nāma natthi;
atk-abh03a44:10_8: Iti imāsaṁ pariññānaṁ vasena sabbapadesu attho veditabboti.
